regen.absent_element: restrictions on changing non-changeable parameters like the deadline and cost
regen.new_specification: The scheduler shall prevent changes to critical job parameters such as deadline and cost unless specified conditions are met.

regen.absent_element: restriction on changing crucial scheduling parameters
regen.new_specification: The scheduler shall restrict changes to crucial scheduling parameters like deadline and cost, unless specific overriding conditions are explicitly satisfied.

regen.absent_element: explicit conditions allowing job parameter changes
regen.new_specification: The scheduler shall permit changes to the output directory or allow a delayed deadline only if specific conditions defined by system policies are met.

label: If the user wishes to specify a different output directory or a delayed deadline, the scheduler shall modify the job parameters.
absence: situation of the user wishes to specify job parameters
